story.text: Jan 2 American Financial Realty Trust AFR.N said it sold the State Street Financial Center, a one million square foot office building in Boston, to an affiliate of private real estate investment firm Fortis Property Group for $889 million. The net proceeds to the company of about $200 million from the sale will be used to repay debt, the real estate investment trust said in a statement. American Financial owns 70 percent of the property, along with IPC US Income REIT, the company said. (Reporting by Dilipp S. Nag in Bangalore)
story.title: american financial sells boston property for $ 889 mln
